task.title: Add a New Adresses
task.shortdesc: This tutorial will help you add new addresses using the MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: You must be logged in to the MyPack Portal to make changes to your address. Dual authentication may be required.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select Addresses.
Under the appropriate header, if no address is defined, select the ‘Add Address’ button
You can either select the ‘Copy From’ button to copy the address from address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields.
